trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Tholl tinkerer is looking for an outsider's help.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Tholl tinkerer.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Oh, you couldn't have chosen a better time to visit!

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_001<tab>Those vile Goggs have stolen away my precious automaton! Stolen her away, and stashed her in some cluttered corner of their village with the rest of their ill-gotten goods...
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_003<tab>Problem is, I'm a drinker, not a fighter. And I doubt I could creep past their guards without one of them seeing me.

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_004<tab>That's where I need your help! If <var 09 E948 ((a Hume)) ((an elf)) ((a strange dwarf)) ((a Mystel)) ((a Galdjent)) ((a Drahn)) ((a Ronso)) ((a Viis)) /var> like you were to walk in and distract them, then I could smuggle out my automaton with no one the wiser!
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_005<tab>I mean, you shouldn't be in any danger. Goggs and Tholls are mortal enemies, aye, but they don't attack other folk on sight. Usually.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_006<tab>Let's move a little closer to Komra, and get this rescue mission underway! Don't you worry, my little bucket of bolts─you'll soon be home again!
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_010<tab>Do you see those two lookouts? Just walk up to them, bold as you please, and give a hearty “lali-ho!”

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_011<tab>Once you have their attention, tell them...oh, I don't know...that you saw a stinky Tholl sneaking about nearby or something. That should get them moving. Then I'll tiptoe in, grab my automaton, and meet you back here.

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_012<tab>Just belt out a happy “lali-ho,” then tell those lookouts you saw a Tholl nearby. Once they move off to investigate, I'll slip in and out, then meet you back here with my automaton. Sound like a plan?
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Lali-ho

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_SYSTEM_110_020<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing “Lali-ho” to distract the Gogg lookouts.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_DWARFA03550_120_020<tab>Hm? You lookin' for trouble, stranger?
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_DWARFA03550_000_020<tab>Lali-ho! What brings you to Komra?
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_DWARFA03550_000_021<tab>What!? A stinkin', ugly Tholl!? I'll catch the bugger by his piss-drenched beard, and knock his helm clear into next week!
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_DWARFB03550_000_022<tab>Lali-ho! What can the Gogg do for you?
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_DWARFB03550_000_023<tab>A Tholl!? Here!? Aye, you did well to let me know. I'll soon take care of this lurker...
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_030<tab>Well done, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! You played your part to perfection! As you can see, the rescue was a success!
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_031<tab>Come on back to Tomra, and we can talk rewards.
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_040<tab>Ever since there've been dwarves, it seems the Goggs have hated the Tholls. Although I'm not rightly sure why...
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_041<tab>Well, I know why we hate the Goggs! Their beards are unkempt, straggly messes, and the bastards dig in our mines without so much as a by-your-leave!

TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_042<tab>Grrr, it makes my blood boil! Next time they come around, I'll be waiting with an automaton army! We'll make them wish they never left Komra, the thieving, scrounging curs!
TEXT_LUCKZI014_03550_MECHANISM03550_000_043<tab>Oh, I almost forgot your reward. And I'll be keeping a closer eye on my dear clunker here, don't you worry...
